title: My Project Dashboard
text:
This repository contains four Snakemake pipelines (modules) for processing, analyzing, and visualizing data.
Each module is independent and can be updated or run separately.






Module
Purpose
Status / Notes
Links / Reports




Module 1
Data preprocessing
Update workflow when new raw data is available
Folder


Module 2
Analysis pipeline
Generates interactive plots from processed data
Report


Module 3
Statistical modeling
Creates model outputs and summary reports
Folder


Module 4
Visualization
Produces dashboards and interactive visualizations
Report




Tip: All module reports are generated by running the respective Snakemake pipelines locally. GitHub Pages only hosts static HTML.





To update any module:
```bash # Navigate to the module cd moduleX
